header.subtitle: Consistently rated as excellent by 225-60r17 drivers
Most popular among drivers in PA
Check out the sale price on this tire
Consistently rated as excellent by 225-60r17 drivers

content.body:
### Shop 225/60R17 Tire Size CUVs and SUVs are some of the most popular vehicles on the road today, and plenty of them use 225/60R17 tires thanks to their larger diameter. If you drive a Chevrolet Trailblazer, Hyundai Tucson, Jeep Cherokee, Kia Sportage, or Subaru Crosstrek, you might have a set of 225/60R17 tires such as the [Continental ProContact TX](https://simpletire.com/brands/continental-tires/procontact-tx), Michelin Primacy A/S, Firestone Destination LE2, Kumho Crugen Premium KL33, or Yokohama Geolandar G91F attached. Popular vehicles: 2021-2022 Chevrolet Trailblazer
2010-2021 Hyundai Tucson
2014-2021 Jeep Cherokee
2011-2021 Kia Sportage
2018-2021 Subaru Crosstrek Most drivers use all-season tires thanks to their ability to perform in dry, wet, and light winter weather conditions. Check out the Pirelli Cinturato P7 All Season Plus 2, [Michelin Defender T+H](https://simpletire.com/brands/michelin-tires/defender-t-plus-h), Yokohama Avid Ascend LX, and Kumho Solus TA31 if you want a new set of 225/60R17 tires that offer strong performance year-round. Do you live in an area that gets heavy ice and snow? You might need to buy winter tires in the colder months if that’s the case, so consider the Continental VikingContact 7, [Nokian Hakkapeliitta 9 SUV](https://simpletire.com/brands/nokian-tires/hakkapeliitta-9-SUV), Bridgestone DM-V2, or General Altimax Arctic 12 for strong traction and performance in lower temperatures, ice, slush, and snow. Drivers of the Chevrolet Trailblazer, Jeep Cherokee, or Subaru Crosstrek might want to take their ride off-road from time to time. If that’s the case, all-terrain tires are your best bet, and tires like the Toyo Open Country A/T III, Nitto Terra Grappler G2, Falken Wildpeak A/T Trail, or [Hankook Dynapro AT2 (RF11)](https://simpletire.com/brands/hankook-tires/dynapro-at2-rf11) are more than capable of providing great traction and performance on any terrain. Whether you drive a Chevrolet Trailblazer, Hyundai Tucson, Subaru Crosstrek, or something else, SimpleTire has a set of 225/60R17 tires that meets your needs at a great price!

info.title: Did you know?
info.body: A reliable brand is the #1 ask for most drivers. Here you can shop all the most popular brands and discover new ones – all tested, ranked and rated by our customers.
